titleStmt.title: Antinomians and familists condemned by the synod of elders in Nevv-England: with the proceedings of the magistrates against them, and their apology for the same. Together with a memorable example of Gods iudgments upon some of those persons so proceeded against.
titleStmt.author: Winthrop, John, 1588-1649,
Weld, Thomas, 1590?-1662,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neare the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to John Winthrop and to Thomas Weld, who signed the preface of a later edition (Wing W3095A).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 16 1643"; final 4 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neare the Royall Exchange.
